titleStmt.title: Paidobaptismos orthobaptismos: or, The baptism of infants vindicated by scriptures and reasons Humbly offered in order to a composure of differences at this juncture of time. By Nath. Taylor, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Nathanael, d. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Butler next door to the Lamb and Three Bowls in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: The first two words of title are in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
